comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: "The John Foord Bridge was completed in 1895, and was the last in a series of six existing metal lattice truss bridges designed by J A McDonald and constructed over the Murray River between 1887 and 1895." - www.environment.gov.au/cgi-bin/ahdb/search.pl?mode=place_... The river level looks to be in flood ... Wahgunyah to Corowa bridge (c.1900) [SLSA: PRG 1258/2/2421] Murray Bridge Corowa (c.1910) [SLV: H90.140/983, a01109]

comment._content: I have been wondering about the date - the turnstile and plinth look 1930s to me (see note).

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: The river appears to be flowing from right to left  so the picture was taken in Victoria.
